level.text: Except in the case of an emergency, or except as otherwise provided by the Mayor by regulation, no amphibian aircraft shall land upon, takeoff from, operate on, or anchor in District of Columbia waters without the prior written approval of the Mayor.

In issuing regulations to govern the operation of amphibian aircraft on District of Columbia waters, the Mayor shall comply with ยง 105 of the D.C. Administrative Procedure Act (D.C. Code ยง 1-1505 (1999 Repl.)).
